misc: The phenomenon called 'Okkotoberfest' was named after his alcohol-induced condition in a past Hector event
biography: Okko, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his resilience and determination on the course. Representing Hirsala Golf, Okko has participated in the Hector Trophée on four prior occasions, and is expected to make his fifth appearance in 2025. He is celebrated amongst fans for his dedication to the sport.

Despite facing challenges, notably persistent back problems that have threatened to cut short his career, Okko has managed to secure one coveted Hector Trophée victory. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him, his sights are firmly set on future triumphs.

Off the course, Okko's name is synonymous with the legendary 'Okkotoberfest,' a phenomenon born from his memorable, albeit alcohol-induced, antics at a past Hector event. This light-hearted association adds a unique layer to Okko's persona, endearing him to spectators and fellow competitors alike.
